member.name: IWICBitmap.Lock
member.summary: Provides access to a rectangular area of the bitmap.

param.name: flags
param.para: The access mode you wish to obtain for the lock. This is a bitwise combination of for read, write, or read and write access.

member.param: A pointer that receives the locked memory location.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICBitmap.SetPalette
member.param: The palette to use for conversion.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICBitmap.SetResolution
member.summary: Changes the physical resolution of the image.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICBitmap
member.summary: Defines methods that add the concept of writeability and static in-memory representations of bitmaps to .
